abstract: PetroChina, China’s largest oil and gas producer, said on Sunday it plans to make an initial public offering of shares in Shanghai that may be China’s largest, raising more than $9 billion.
lead_paragraph: PetroChina, China’s largest oil and gas producer, said on Sunday it plans to make an initial public offering of shares in Shanghai that may be China’s largest, raising more than $9 billion.

headline.main: PetroChina to Sell Shares on Shanghai Market
